Module crcCards

Class School

java.lang.Object
School
public class School extends Object
The School class hold the basic constructor abilities to create Lecture Halls, Classes, Instructors, and Students.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    School(String[] listLectureHalls, String[] listClasses, String[] listInstructors, String[] listStudents)
    This constructs a new School

    This method creates a course catalog of classes, class prerequisites, class times, class locations, and their professors.

    This method creates a new professor with instructorName and instructorID and adds it to listInstructors

      public String[] createCourseCatalog(School listClasses)
      This method creates a course catalog of classes, class prerequisites, class times, class locations, and their professors. All of these details are encapsulated in the Class object.
